standards.title: Neutral Feet
standards.question: Are your feet habitually in a neutral position?

standards.title: A Supple Thoracic Spine
standards.question: Do you have a pliant, properly organized thoracic spine?

standards.title: Hip Flexion
standards.question: Can you stand on your left leg and express normal range of hip flexion with your right hip for 30 seconds, then repeat with your right leg and left hip?
